response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,050,000. This represents a significant savings of $150,000 compared to the standard market value. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us to establish a mutually beneficial relationship. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1050000}
